entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
